snippet: Mr. Fomenko, whose productions often drew the wrath of the Soviet authorities, founded his own theater group and staged innovative interpretations of the classics.
abstract: Pyotr Fomenko, renowned Russian stage director and the founder of one of Moscow's leading theaters, dies at age 80.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Fomenko, whose productions often drew the wrath of the Soviet authorities, founded his own theater group and staged innovative interpretations of the classics.

headline.seo: Pyotr Fomenko, Innovative Russian Stage Director, Dies at 80
headline.main: Pyotr Fomenko, Russian Stage Director, Dies at 80
